main event: A bright light was observed in the sky by a witness driving on US Highway 67 near San Angelo, Texas, at around 7:45 pm on September 16, 1967.
interesting points: The light was described as larger than any conventional aircraft and appeared pulsating and flickering., The sighting lasted approximately 15-20 minutes before the light disappeared suddenly., 16-20 other objects were reported, with 7-8 being clearly observed., The objects flew in an irregular array at high speeds and made sharp turns., The observer, who is a student in flight school, marked the sighting as a first-time event.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: the witness and their spouse, both impressed by the unusual nature of the sighting
